meaningMnemonic: You're so <kanji>mediocre</kanji> that you're <kanji>flat</kanji>. That's really <vocabulary>common</vocabulary>. Look at most of the midwest. It's really <vocabulary>mediocre</vocabulary> and flat too. And there's a whole lot of it out there.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
